sentences: At its first session, the Ad Hoc Group on Article 13 decided to request Parties, non-parties, and intergovernmental and non-governmental organizations to make written submissions in response to a questionnaire on a multilateral consultative process (FCCC/AG13/1995/2, para.
Nineteen Parties, one non-party and ten NGOs submitted responses, which were compiled in documents FCCC/AG13/1996/MISC.1 and MISC.2.
The documents provide a spectrum of views on the multilateral consultative process and identify common areas of understanding.
enb_long_title: Second Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
